data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
Paranaense have been awarded a corner by Flavio Rodrigues de Souza.
In the minute 3, Thiago Heleno (Paranaense) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Flavio Rodrigues de Souza awards Gremio a goal kick.
Free kick for Gremio in their own half.
In the minute 5, Flavio Rodrigues de Souza signals a free kick to Gremio.
Gremio have a dangerous throw-in.
Corner awarded to Gremio.
In the minute 6, Paranaense have a goal kick.
Gremio attack but Rodrigues's header doesn't find the target.
Goal kick for Paranaense at Arena da Baixada.
In the minute 7, Flavio Rodrigues de Souza awards the home team a throw-in.
Paranaense are coming forward and Renato Kayzer gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Curitiba.
In the minute 9, Can Gremio get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Paranaense's half?
Gremio surge into the attack at Arena da Baixada but Lucas Silva’s header is off-target.
Ball goes out of play for a Paranaense goal kick.
In the minute 11, Throw-in for Paranaense at Arena da Baixada.
Flavio Rodrigues de Souza awards Gremio a goal kick.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 14, Goal kick for Paranaense at Arena da Baixada.
Flavio Rodrigues de Souza signals a free kick to Gremio in their own half.
Paranaense awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 15, Flavio Rodrigues de Souza signals a throw-in for Paranaense, close to Gremio's area.
Gremio are whistled for offside.
Throw-in for Gremio in their own half.
In the minute 19, Gremio awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Gremio capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Paranaense's half?
Paranaense have been awarded a corner by Flavio Rodrigues de Souza.
In the minute 21, Free kick for Paranaense in the half of Gremio.
Ball safe as Gremio is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Gremio to take a throw-in in Paranaense territory.
In the minute 25, Throw-in Gremio.
Free kick Paranaense.
Gremio have a goal kick.
In the minute 29, Paranaense are in shooting range from this free kick.
Everton is booked for the away team.
Isaque (Gremio) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
In the minute 31, Ball goes out of play for a Paranaense goal kick.
Throw-in for Gremio in the half of Paranaense.
Corner awarded to Paranaense.
In the minute 38, Flavio Rodrigues de Souza signals a Paranaense throw-in in Gremio's half.
In Curitiba a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Flavio Rodrigues de Souza signals a free kick to Paranaense in their own half.
In the minute 40, Maycon Nikao is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
The match at Arena da Baixada has been interrupted briefly for a check on Thaciano, who is down injured.
Paranaense’s Maycon Nikao is on his feet again at Arena da Baixada.
In the minute 42, Gremio's Thaciano looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Paranaense needs to be cautious. Gremio have an attacking throw-in.
Gremio's Isaque misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 43, It's a goal kick for the home team in Curitiba.
Goal! Carlos Eduardo gives Paranaense a 1-0 lead.
Great play from Thiago Heleno to set up the goal.
In the minute 45, Flavio Rodrigues de Souza signals a free kick to Paranaense.
1 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
Goal kick for Gremio at Arena da Baixada.
In the minute 45, The first-half is over.
The second-half is underway at Arena da Baixada.
In the minute 46, Flavio Rodrigues de Souza signals a Paranaense throw-in in Gremio's half.
The away team have replaced Everton with Pepe. This is the first substitution made today by Renato Gaucho.
Renato Kayzer of Paranaense gets in a strike, but is off target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Curitiba.
In the minute 47, In Curitiba a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Paranaense to take a throw-in in Gremio territory.
Throw-in for Gremio close to the penalty box.
In the minute 50, Throw-in high up the field for Gremio in Curitiba.
Pepe for Gremio drives towards goal at Arena da Baixada. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Free kick for Gremio in the half of Paranaense.
In the minute 53, Paranaense's Maycon Nikao has been booked in Curitiba.
Corner awarded to Gremio.
Own goal! Thiago Heleno scores in his own net to make it 1-1.
In the minute 57, Ball safe as Paranaense is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Paranaense have a dangerous throw-in.
Throw-in Gremio.
In the minute 61, Free kick Paranaense.
Paranaense are caught offside.
Throw-in for Gremio in the half of Paranaense.
In the minute 63, Flavio Rodrigues de Souza signals a throw-in for Gremio, close to Paranaense's area.
In Curitiba a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In Curitiba Gremio attack through Pepe. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 64, Flavio Rodrigues de Souza awards Paranaense a goal kick.
Can Gremio get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Paranaense's half?
Christian for Paranaense has been booked by Flavio Rodrigues de Souza and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 66, Free kick for Gremio in the half of Paranaense.
Gremio are pushing forward but Lucas Silva's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Paranaense goal kick.
In the minute 68, Throw-in for Gremio in their own half.
Fabinho is on a sub for Carlos Eduardo for Paranaense.
Paulo Autuori is making the team's second substitution at Arena da Baixada with Jorginho replacing Lucho Gonzalez.
In the minute 69, Flavio Rodrigues de Souza signals a free kick to Gremio.
Paranaense awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Paranaense in their own half.
In the minute 71, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Paranaense awarded a free kick in their own half.
Flavio Rodrigues de Souza awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 74, Renato Gaucho (Gremio) is making a second substitution, with Ferreira replacing Luiz Fernando.
Ferreira for Gremio gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Paranaense have a goal kick.
In the minute 76, Free kick Gremio.
Paranaense's Renato Kayzer misses with an attempt on goal.
Flavio Rodrigues de Souza awards Gremio a goal kick.
In the minute 77, Attention is being given to Paranaense’s Pedro Henrique and play has been suspended briefly.
Lucas Halter (Paranaense) has replaced the possibly injured Pedro Henrique.
Richard is replacing Wellington for Paranaense at Arena da Baixada.
In the minute 80, Paranaense awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick Gremio.
Gremio to take a throw-in in Paranaense territory.
In the minute 81, Free kick for Paranaense in their own half.
Paranaense have been awarded a corner by Flavio Rodrigues de Souza.
Throw-in for Gremio at Arena da Baixada.
In the minute 83, Diogo Barbosa is replacing Lucas Silva for the away team.
Flavio Rodrigues de Souza signals a Paranaense throw-in in Gremio's half.
Can Paranaense get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Gremio's half?
Flavio Rodrigues de Souza signals a free kick to Gremio in their own half.
In the minute 87, Paulo Autuori (Paranaense) is making a fifth substitution, with Walter replacing Renato Kayzer.
Gremio take a 1-2 lead thanks to Ferreira.
In the minute 88, Paulo Victor instrumental with a fine assist.
Throw-in for Gremio in their own half.
5 minutes will be added to the 2nd half in Curitiba.
Flavio Rodrigues de Souza signals a free kick to Gremio in their own half.
Throw-in for Gremio close to the penalty box.
Paranaense have a goal kick.
Throw-in high up the field for Paranaense in Curitiba.
Throw-in for Paranaense at Arena da Baixada.
Flavio Rodrigues de Souza blows to end the match. The final score is 1-2.
Renato Gaucho is making the team's fourth substitution at Arena da Baixada with Ruan replacing Isaque.
Vinicius Abner (Paranaense) has received a first yellow card.
